Ramona Ripston , head of the American Civil Liberties Union of Southern California
years of boasting that their methods were models in policing
Joseph McNamara , retired chief of San Jose 's department and now a fellow at Stanford University 's Hoover Institution
cities around the country about racism and brutality
a definite trend in the past 10 years
supporters of the local law establishment.
We 're a last-resort mechanism when other kinder and gentler processes fail in our society
a law enforcement lack of leadership

an attorney specializing in police misconduct cases
